features: OBI-WAN KENOBI (WANDERING JEDI): Obi-Wan Kenobi is set years after the dramatic events of Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith where Kenobi faced the corruption of his friend and Jedi apprentice, Anakin Skywalker turned Sith Lord Darth Vader
VINTAGE-INSPIRED PACKAGING: Star Wars The Vintage Collection 3.75-inch scale classic Star Wars figures and vehicles feature original Kenner branding (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.)

CLASSIC STAR WARS FIGURE: This Obi-Wan Kenobi (Wandering Jedi) action figure is inspired by the character in Star Wars: Obi-Wan Kenobi and makes a great gift for Star Wars collectors and fans ages 4 and up
SERIES-BASED CHARACTER-INSPIRED ACCESSORIES: This Star Wars The Vintage Collection action figure comes with 6 entertainment-inspired accessories that make a great addition to any Star Wars collection

PREMIUM DESIGN AND ARTICULATION: Highly articulated with fully poseable head, arms, and legs, the Star Wars Obi-Wan Kenobi (Wandering Jedi) figure can be displayed in action figure and vehicle collections
body.description: Obi-Wan Kenobi is set years after the dramatic events of Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith where Kenobi faced the corruption of his friend and Jedi apprentice, Anakin Skywalker turned Sith Lord Darth Vader Celebrate the legacy of Star Wars, the action-packed space saga from a galaxy far, far away, with premium 3.75-inch scale figures and vehicles from Star Wars The Vintage Collection. Figures feature premium detail and design across product and packaging inspired by the original line, as well as the entertainment-inspired collector grade deco that fans have come to know and love. (Additional products each sold separately. Subject to availability.) Featuring premium detail and design across multiple points of articulation inspired by Star Wars: Obi-Wan Kenobi, this Star Wars The Vintage Collection 3.75-inch-scale figure makes a great gift for Star Wars fans. Star Wars products are produced by Hasbro under license from Lucasfilm Ltd Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks like Obi Wan with great articulation.
reviews.reviewText: This was on sale, so I grabbed it. It's got two cool "Lola" droid accessories as well as the ol' laser sword.The likeness to Ewan McGregor is very good.I didn't exactly need a Kenobi figure, but I liked the series and I can always repurpose a Jedi body with good, modern articulation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great likeness to the character
reviews.reviewText: While browsing, I came across this version of the character, as seen in the streaming show, rather than any of the cinematic movies. This is a great iteration of the character and the sculpt is amazing. I love the details and the overall solidity of this action figure. This is a highly-detailed sculpt, especially for a 3.75 inch figure. I'm pleased with my purchase, even though I wish I didn't have to pay as much. Still, I feel that I got what I paid for, and so I can't complain, no matter how cheap I am. I'd say that this action figure is a great addition to any collector, but it's also suitable for play. The figure has great articulation and no balance/standing issues. I'd say that this one is great for dioramas or display, more than anything. Given the 3.75 inch scale, this take on Obi-Wan is probably fantastic for diorama builders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Classic action figure
reviews.reviewText: Star Wars figures were my prized possession as a kid. This updated figure from the Kenobi series is even better in terms of details, accessories, and (*gasp*) articulated arms and legs. I would have loved that feature with the originals!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this figure! Comes with little droids!
reviews.reviewText: Did not care for the show but love this figure! So surprised it includes two of the little flying droid. Details are so good and great articulation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great fig….came with Lola which is confusing (she should have came with little Leia)…great add to the line of obi-wans …pick it up if you’re still messing with the 3.75s…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little Ben Kenobi
reviews.reviewText: Fun Obi-Wan to play with. Has a lot of accessories including his companion droid.For a 1/18 scale figure he is pretty possable and can pull many jedi poses.Highly recommend even if you a looking for a little desk toy.
Muy buena figura, increíbles detalles y llegó en perfectas condiciones, lo recomiendo

reviews.reviewTitle: Almost perfect, but better than black series!
reviews.reviewText: Two lightsaber hilts pls a flight stand for the droid. Softgoods. This is better than black series. Only drawback is that unsightly torso hinge
Sono molto soddisfatta dell'acquisto, trovo buona la qualità e anche la mobilità del personaggio

Me gusta que la figura tenga mucho parecido al actor, la capa y parte de la ropa son de tela, los accesorios también están bien hechos. Lo que no me gustó fue la caja sin protección donde venia la figura. Recomendable para coleccionistas como yo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent Obi Wan figure from the TV series. He has a range of accessories such as gun and fold up droid as well as his trusty light sabre for when an old friend comes calling......He also has his old robe which is really neat. The figure is another great sculpt, a far cry from the original kenner/palitoy figures, looking at you, big headed Solo!It's also a super articulated figure meaning in his quiet moments he can do some actual jedi exercises. Very good figure.
